author: dildick
body:
Realistic digi data formats for ME0 subdetector. This allows us to start building an ME0 local trigger.
* ME0 strip/pad digi is similar to GEM strip/pad digi. 
* ME0PadDigi is a fat digi built from ME0DigiPreReco for now. This will change in the future
* ME0TriggerDigi is a trimmed down version of CSCCorrelatedLCTDigi. Also this may change in the future.
* A skeleton ME0 TMB was implemented to build ME0TriggerDigi from ME0PadDigi
* There should be no differences in the standard tests since no existing producers were modified. No new producers were enabled in the standard DIGI chain.
title: Realistic ME0 digi and stub data formats; skeleton ME0 local trigger
